name: Air-Fryer Roasted Veggies
author: Juliana Hale
summary: Air fryers are taking over kitchens nationwide. They're basically mini convection ovens that 'fry' foods with little to no oil, less fat, and fewer calories. A heating element and fan bathe the food in hot air to produce a crispy finished product. Use 3 cups of assorted vegetables, cut into 1-inch pieces. Serve with desired dipping sauce.
ingredients: ½ cup diced sweet red pepper
1/4 teaspoon seasoning, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 360 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Add vegetables, oil, salt, pepper, and desired seasoning to a bowl
Toss to coat; arrange in fryer basket
Cook vegetables for 10 minutes, stirring after 5 minutes
